MGR:Gaze.NAME: Gaze

MGR:Stereo.NAME: Stereophonic
DESCRIPTIONS: #yAttackNote gains half block. NL #yDefendNote deals damage to a random enemy.

MGR:StereoPlus.NAME: Stereophonic+
DESCRIPTIONS: #yAttackNote gains half block. NL #yDefendNote deals damage to a random enemy. NL #yDrawNote gains double block and deal double damage to all enemies.
